content.body: is today one of our meeting days?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: is today one of our meeting days?

content.body: What is our process for discussing proposals like this?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: What is our process for discussing proposals like this?

content.body:
> <@rwaldron:matrix.org> What is our process for discussing proposals like this?

I think in the future it'd be ideal to use the RFC process for that, but also it seems like Shu basically already did the legwork that the RFC process requires

I think in the future it'd be ideal to use the RFC process for that, but also it seems like Shu basically already did the legwork that the RFC process requires

content.body: do we have a collective email alias for test262 maintainers?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: do we have a collective email alias for test262 maintainers?

content.body: (that'll be easier than figuring out who wasn't included on the email from the ESMeta folks and what address they'd like it forwarded to)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: (that'll be easier than figuring out who wasn't included on the email from the ESMeta folks and what address they'd like it forwarded to)

content.body: we don't, but we could make one
